definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: In this thesis, a study of CMOS integrated circuits for the application of automatic humidity sensing is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本論文探討CMOS積體電路於自動溼度感測的應用。

sentences.english: Silicon-based MMICs for millimeter-wave applications were also developed.
sentences.chinese: 我們同時亦發展毫米波矽基單晶積體電路。

sentences.english: We went to the fourth paradigm, transistors. And finally integrated circuits.
sentences.chinese: 我們進入了第四種模式，即晶體管，最後是積體電路。

sentences.english: Wire-bonding is one of the critical processes that determine the quality of IC packaging.
sentences.chinese: 積體電路封裝品質的良窳，焊線是一關鍵製程。
